articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: Backward compatible: Many old Oblivion mods still work on Oblivion Remastered - Ars Technica
articles.description: The modding community is already hard at work despite lack of “official” support.

articles.title: EU hits Apple and Meta with €700m of fines - BBC
articles.description: The tech giants have reacted with fury, accusing the EU of unfairly pursuing US companies.
articles.content:
Imran Rahman-Jones
The European Union has ordered Apple and Meta to pay a combined 700m (£599m) in the first fines it has issued under legislation intended to curb the power of big tech.
It has iss… [+5469 chars]
